document.full_text: tampa bays rays outfielder b.j. upton has been suspended for two games for a tirade late in a recent game after being called out on strikes, major league baseball said on saturday.
document.title: tampa bays rays' upton banned two games for tirade
lines_and_colors: tampa bays rays outfielder b.j. upton has been suspended for two games for a tirade late in a recent game after being called out on strikes, major league baseball said on saturday.
